column1: The Purple Pig////I was under the impression that this place served small tapas and plates but everything I ordered was bigger than expected. We expected a long wait and were told over the phone that the wait could be 2-4 hours during the dinner hour so we decided to come at around 10pm to avoid the wait. We still had to wait for a table but we were given the option of ordering from the full menu and eating at the outside patio if we wanted. We decided to stand around a table outside and order from the menu (no seats but we didn't mind standing and eating since the table was tall). Eventually
column2: by the time we figured out what to get
column3: we did end up getting seated inside.
